attributes.action: ignore petition to stop building airports and runways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a myth that air travel is the biggest carbon producer-it actually only contribute 3% of all total emissions.Besides,what are the alternatives??the roads are gridlocked,the trains are pathetically overcrowded and expensive.These so called green protesters are just layabouts with nothing better to do.Did you notice the vehicles at the camp at heathrow recently?.Plus all the wood fires ,and waste that was created.I say lets build more runways,and expand all airports

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
